snippet: A Japanese woman said that she had been lured to the Gaya district in Bihar by a man posing as a tour guide and raped, the police said.
abstract: Indian police arrest five men in connection with alleged abduction and rape of Japanese woman; details of case vary widely as police continue to investigate.
lead_paragraph: A Japanese woman said that she had been lured to the Gaya district in Bihar by a man posing as a tour guide and raped, the police said.

headline.main: Five Arrested in India Rape Case
headline.print_headline: Five Arrested in India Rape Case
